_sText:
Hello all ! As you see there is now Deathrun_Southpark,
There already was a simpsons, lego, and cartoon but no Southpark !

I Hope u like the map, it has alot of custom textures and sounds.

There are 14 traps total but dont you think it is that easy !!!

This map includes;
42 CT Spawnpoints
2 T spawnpoints
Modded terrorist speed
Out & Indoor environment
Cubemaps
5 secret grenades ! try to find them by jumping in corners ;)

* 4 Different endings *
1: Awp - Awp vs Awp
2: Bhop - Jump for a weapon !
3: Old - Get a weapon and kill the T Easily by spawning on T side
4: BOOM ! - See for yourself !!!!!

Trap list:
1 : Cartman Farts ; you are getting blowed from the platforms
2 : Stanley; stanley's bones hurt you ! dont stand on them !!!
3 ; Kyle mystery phone; try to sneak over the block !
4 ; Dead kenny ; kenny died by some serious explosions !
5 ; The sucker ; this trap sucks you away infront of the teleporter !
6 ; Chef ; dont walk into his pan or he will bake you !
7 ; Officer Barbrady ; dont across the street before watching !
8 ; Random pillars ; this is a jump challenge !
9 ; Timmy ; please dont hit the blue floor or you get stuck and killed by some explosions !!!
10 ; Mr Hankey ; try to across mr hankey's poop !
11 ; Mr Mackey ; mr mackey his glasses fell try to walk through them !
12 ; Wendy ; Wendy's door.......
13 ; Spiky Laddder ; dont climb up to fast.. or you get spiked !
14 ; Aim for jump ; timing is the way to pass !
15 ; Not so fast ; rush.



=(* BUGS *)= : 
1.The second trap doesn't hurt you.
2. The zebra cross doesn't hurt you.
3. You can see the buttons through the wall.
4. The trap before the last one pushes you the wrong way.

=(* FIX *)=
 -----> All bugs are fixed !  <------

=(* ADD *)=
1 More Easter Egg added,
1 More trap added, the wooden block where u must climb up now come out spikes so watch out !

-------THE MAP IS NOW FULLY BUGGLESS --------

My excuses for all the versions, but bugs are normal.

I hope you enjoy it have fun !
